tika-s0201t1:1161_1: pharamānoti pītisamuṭṭhānehi paṇītarūpehi sakalasarīraṁ pharamāno. Dhammaguṇe anussarantassapi
tika-s0201t1:1161_2: yāva upacārā sakalasarīraṁ pharamāno pītisambojjhaṅgo uppajjatīti. Evaṁ sesaanussatīsu
tika-s0201t1:1161_4: Samāpattiyā…pe… samudācarantīti idañca upasamānussatidassanaṁ. Saṅkhārānañhi sappadesavūpasamepi
tika-s0201t1:1161_5: nippadesavūpasame viya tathā paññāya pavattito bhāvanāmanasikāro kilesavikkhambhanasamattho
tika-s0201t1:1161_7: uppādāya hotīti. Pasādanīyesu ṭhānesu pasādasinehābhāvena thusasamahadayatā lūkhatā,
tika-s0201t1:1161_8: sā tattha ādaragāravākaraṇena viññāyatīti āha ‘‘asakkaccakiriyāya saṁsūcitalūkhabhāve’’ti.
tika-s0201t1:1162: Kāyacittadarathavūpasamalakkhaṇā passaddhi eva passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, tassa passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa.
tika-s0201t1:1163_1: sappāyautuiriyāpathaggahaṇaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. Tañhi tividhaṁ sappāyaṁ seviyamānaṁ kāyassa
tika-s0201t1:1163_2: kallatāpādanavasena cittassa kallataṁ āvahantaṁ duvidhāyapi passaddhiyā kāraṇaṁ hoti.
tika-s0201t1:1163_3: Ahetukaṁ sattesu labbhamānaṁ sukhaṁ dukkhanti ayameko anto, issarādivisamahetukanti
tika-s0201t1:1163_4: pana ayaṁ dutiyo, ete ubho ante anupagamma yathāsakaṁ kammunā hotīti ayaṁ majjhimā
tika-s0201t1:1163_5: paṭipatti. Majjhatto payogo yassa hoti majjhattapayogo, tassa bhāvo majjhattapayogatā.
tika-s0201t1:1163_6: Ayañhi pahāya sāraddhakāyataṁ passaddhakāyatāya kāraṇaṁ hontī passaddhidvayaṁ āvahati,
tika-s0201t1:1164_0: Yathāsamāhitākārasallakkhaṇavasena gayhamāno purimuppanno samatho eva samathanimittaṁ.
tika-s0201t1:1164_1: Nānārammaṇe paribbhamanena vividhaṁ aggaṁ etassāti byaggo, vikkhepo. Tathā hi so
tika-s0201t1:1164_2: anavaṭṭhānaraso bhantatāpaccupaṭṭhāno ca vutto. Ekaggatābhāvato byaggapaṭipakkhoti
tika-s0201t1:1164_3: abyaggo, samādhi. So eva nimittanti pubbe viya vattabbaṁ. Tenāha ‘‘avikkhepaṭṭhena
tika-s0201t1:1165: Vatthuvisadakiriyā indriyasamattapaṭipādanā ca paññāvahā vuttā, samādhānāvahāpi tā honti samādhānāvahabhāveneva paññāvahabhāvatoti vuttaṁ ‘‘vatthuvisada…pe… veditabbā’’ti.
tika-s0201t1:1166_1: nāma kasiṇanimittassa uggahaṇakusalatā’’icceva vuttaṁ. Kasiṇanimittassāti ca nidassanamattaṁ
tika-s0201t1:1166_2: daṭṭhabbaṁ. Asubhanimittassādikassapi hi yassa kassaci jhānuppattinimittassa uggahaṇakosallaṁ
tika-s0201t1:1167_1: Tassa paggahaṇanti tassa līnassa cittassa dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena
tika-s0201t1:1168_0: ‘‘Yasmiñca kho, bhikkhave, samaye līnaṁ cittaṁ hoti, kālo tasmiṁ samaye dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa
tika-s0201t1:1168_1: bhāvanāya, kālo vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo pītisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya
tika-s0201t1:1168_2: . Taṁ kissa hetu? Līnaṁ, bhikkhave, cittaṁ, taṁ etehi dhammehi susamuṭṭhāpayaṁ hoti.
tika-s0201t1:1168_3: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso parittaṁ aggiṁ ujjāletukāmo assa, so tattha sukkhāni
tika-s0201t1:1168_4: ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya, sukkhāni ca gomayāni pakkhipeyya, sukkhāni ca kaṭṭhāni pakkhipeyya,
tika-s0201t1:1168_5: mukhavātañca dadeyya, na ca paṁsukena okireyya, bhabbo nu kho so puriso parittaṁ
tika-s0201t1:1169: Ettha ca yathāsakaṁ āhāravasena dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīnaṁ bhāvanā samuṭṭhāpanāti veditabbaṁ, sā anantaraṁ vibhāvitā eva.
tika-s0201t1:1170_1: Tassa niggahaṇanti tassa uddhatacittassa samādhisambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena uddhatāpattito
tika-s0201t1:1171_0: ‘‘Yasmiñca kho, bhikkhave, samaye uddhataṁ cittaṁ hoti, kālo tasmiṁ samaye passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa
tika-s0201t1:1171_1: bhāvanāya, kālo samādhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya.
tika-s0201t1:1171_2: Taṁ kissa hetu? Uddhataṁ, bhikkhave, cittaṁ, taṁ etehi dhammehi suvūpasamayaṁ hoti.
tika-s0201t1:1171_3: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso mahantaṁ aggikkhandhaṁ nibbāpetukāmo assa, so tattha
tika-s0201t1:1171_4: allāni ceva tiṇāni…pe… paṁsukena ca okireyya, bhabbo nu kho so puriso mahantaṁ aggikkhandhaṁ
tika-s0201t1:1172_0: Etthāpi yathāsakaṁ āhāravasena passaddhisambojjhaṅgādīnaṁ bhāvanā samuṭṭhāpanāti
tika-s0201t1:1172_1: veditabbā. Tattha passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanā vuttā eva, samādhisambojjhaṅgassa
tika-s0201t1:1173_0: Paññāpayogamandatāyāti paññābyāpārassa appabhāvena. Yathā hi dānaṁ alobhappadhānaṁ,
tika-s0201t1:1173_1: sīlaṁ adosappadhānaṁ, evaṁ bhāvanā amohappadhānā. Tattha yadā paññā na balavatī hoti,
tika-s0201t1:1173_2: tadā bhāvanā pubbenāparaṁ visesāvahā na hoti, anabhisaṅkhato viya āhāro purisassa
tika-s0201t1:1173_3: yogino cittassa abhiruciṁ na janeti, tena taṁ nirassādaṁ hoti, tathā bhāvanāya sammadeva
tika-s0201t1:1173_4: avīthipaṭipattiyā upasamasukhaṁ na vindati, tenāpi cittaṁ nirassādaṁ hoti. Tena vuttaṁ
tika-s0201t1:1173_5: ‘‘paññāpayoga…pe… nirassādaṁ hotī’’ti. Tassa saṁveguppādanaṁ pasāduppādanañca tikicchananti
tika-s0201t1:1173_6: taṁ dassento ‘‘aṭṭha saṁvegavatthūnī’’tiādimāha. Tattha jātijarābyādhimaraṇāni yathārahaṁ
tika-s0201t1:1173_8: apāyadukkhaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ, tayidaṁ sabbaṁ tesaṁ tesaṁ sattānaṁ paccuppannabhavanissitaṁ
tika-s0201t1:1173_9: gahitanti atīte anāgate ca kāle vaṭṭamūlakadukkhāni visuṁ gahitāni. Ye pana sattā
tika-s0201t1:1173_10: āhārūpajīvino, tattha ca uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino, tesaṁ aññehi asādhāraṇaṁ jīvikadukkhaṁ
tika-s0201t1:1173_11: aṭṭhamaṁ saṁvegavatthu gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Ayaṁ vuccati samaye sampahaṁsanatāti
tika-s0201t1:1173_12: ayaṁ sampahaṁsitabbasamaye vuttanayena tena saṁvejanavasena ceva pasāduppādanavasena
tika-s0201t1:1173_13: ca sammadeva pahaṁsanā, saṁvegajananapubbakapasāduppādanena bhāvanācittassa tosanāti attho.
tika-s0201t1:1174_0: Sammāpaṭipattiṁ āgammāti līnuddhaccavirahena samathavīthipaṭipattiyā ca sammā avisamaṁ
tika-s0201t1:1174_1: sammadeva bhāvanāpaṭipattiṁ āgamma. Alīnantiādīsu kosajjapakkhiyānaṁ dhammānaṁ anadhimattatāya
tika-s0201t1:1174_2: alīnaṁ, uddhaccapakkhiyānaṁ anadhimattatāya anuddhataṁ, paññāpayogasattiyā upasamasukhādhigamena
tika-s0201t1:1174_3: ca anirassādaṁ, tato eva ārammaṇe samappavattaṁ samathavīthipaṭipannañca. Tattha
tika-s0201t1:1174_4: alīnatāya paggahe, anuddhatatāya niggahe, anirassādatāya sampahaṁsane na byāpāraṁ
tika-s0201t1:1174_5: āpajjati, alīnānuddhatatāhi ārammaṇe samappavattaṁ, anirassādatāya samathavīthipaṭipannaṁ.
tika-s0201t1:1174_6: Samappavattiyā vā alīnaṁ anuddhataṁ, samathavīthipaṭipattiyā anirassādanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-s0201t1:1174_7: Ayaṁ vuccati samaye ajjhupekkhanatāti ayaṁ ajjhupekkhitabbasamaye bhāvanācittassa
tika-s0201t1:1174_8: paggahaniggahasampahaṁsanesu byāvaṭatāsaṅkhātaṁ paṭipakkhaṁ abhibhuyya pekkhanā vuccati.
tika-s0201t1:1176: Upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammāti ettha yaṁ vattabbaṁ, taṁ heṭṭhā vuttānusārena veditabbaṁ.
tika-s0201t1:1177_1: sati sijjhanato, asati ca asijjhanato, so ca majjhattabhāvo visayavasena duvidhoti
tika-s0201t1:1177_2: āha ‘‘sattamajjhattatā saṅkhāramajjhattatā’’ti. Tadubhaye ca virujjhanaṁ passaddhisambojjhaṅgabhāvanāya
tika-s0201t1:1177_5: rāgo paṭipakkho. Tathā cāha ‘‘upekkhā rāgabahulassa visuddhimaggo’’ti (visuddhi. 1.269).
tika-s0201t1:1178_1: kāraṇehi. Dvīhevāti avadhāraṇaṁ saṅkhyāsamānatāya. Assāmikabhāvo anattaniyatā. Sati
tika-s0201t1:1178_2: hi attani tassa kiñcanabhāvena cīvaraṁ aññañca kiñci attaniyaṁ nāma siyā, so pana
tika-s0201t1:1178_3: koci natthevāti adhippāyo. Anaddhaniyanti na addhānakkhamaṁ, na ciraṭṭhāyi ittaraṁ
tika-s0201t1:1179: Mamāyatīti mamattaṁ karoti, ‘‘mama’’nti taṇhāya pariggayha tiṭṭhati. Dhanāyantāti dhanaṁ drabyaṁ karontā.
tika-s0201t1:1180: Ayaṁ satipaṭṭhānadesanā pubbabhāgamaggavasena desitāti pubbabhāgiyabojjhaṅge sandhāyāha ‘‘bojjhaṅgapariggāhikā sati dukkhasacca’’nti.
tika-s0201t1:1183_0: 119.Yathāsabhāvatoti aviparītasabhāvato bādhanalakkhaṇato, yo yo vā sabhāvo yathāsabhāvo,
tika-s0201t1:1183_1: tato, ruppanādikakkhaḷādisabhāvatoti attho. Janikaṁ samuṭṭhāpikanti pavattalakkhaṇassa
tika-s0201t1:1183_2: dukkhassa janikaṁ nimittalakkhaṇassa samuṭṭhāpikaṁ. Purimataṇhanti dukkhanibbattito
tika-s0201t1:1184_1: sasantatipariyāpanno viya hotīti katvā vuttaṁ ‘‘attano vā cattāri saccānī’’ti. Parassa
tika-s0201t1:1184_2: vāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘imasmiṁyeva byāmamatte kaḷevare sasaññimhi
tika-s0201t1:1184_3: samanake lokañca paññapemi, lokasamudayañca paññapemi, lokanirodhañca paññapemi,
tika-s0201t1:1184_4: lokanirodhagāminipaṭipadañca paññapemī’’ti (saṁ. ni. 1.107). Kathaṁ pana ādikampiko
tika-s0201t1:1184_5: nirodhasaccāni pariggaṇhātīti? Anussavādisiddhamākāraṁ pariggaṇhāti, evañca katvā
tika-s0201t1:1184_6: lokuttarabojjhaṅge uddissapi pariggaho na virujjhati. Yathāsambhavatoti sambhavānurūpaṁ,
tika-s0201t1:1184_7: ṭhapetvā nirodhasaccaṁ sesasaccavasena samudayavayā veditabbāti attho.
tika-s0201t1:1186_1: uddhumātakādīnaṁ sabhāvenevāti navannaṁ sivathikānaṁ appanākammaṭṭhānatā vuttā. Dveyevāti
tika-s0201t1:1186_2: ‘‘ānāpānaṁ, dvattiṁsākāro’’ti imāni dveyeva. Abhinivesoti vipassanābhiniveso, so
tika-s0201t1:1186_3: pana sammasanīyadhamme pariggaho. Iriyāpathā ālokitādayo ca rūpadhammānaṁ avatthāvisesamattatāya
tika-s0201t1:1186_4: na sammasanupagā viññattiādayo viya. Nīvaraṇabojjhaṅgā ādito na pariggahetabbāti
tika-s0201t1:1186_5: vuttaṁ ‘‘iriyāpatha…pe… na jāyatī’’ti. Kesādiapadesena tadupādānadhammā viya iriyāpathādiapadesena
tika-s0201t1:1186_6: tadavatthā rūpadhammā pariggayhanti, nīvaraṇādimukhena ca taṁ sampayuttā taṁnissayadhammāti
tika-s0201t1:1186_7: adhippāyena mahāsīvatthero ‘‘iriyāpathādīsupiabhiniveso jāyatī’’ti āha. Atthi nu
tika-s0201t1:1186_8: kho metiādi pana sabhāvato iriyāpathādīnaṁ ādikammikassa anicchitabhāvadassanaṁ.
tika-s0201t1:1187_0: 137. Kāmaṁ ‘‘idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhū’’tiādinā uddesaniddesesu tattha tattha bhikkhuggahaṇaṁ
tika-s0201t1:1187_1: kataṁ, taṁ paṭipattiyā bhikkhubhāvadassanatthaṁ, desanā pana sabbasādhāraṇāti dassetuṁ
tika-s0201t1:1187_2: ‘‘yo hi koci, bhikkhave’’icceva vuttaṁ, na bhikkhuyevāti dassento ‘‘yo hi koci, bhikkhu
tika-s0201t1:1187_3: vā’’tiādimāha. Dassanamaggena ñātamariyādaṁ anatikkamitvā jānantī sikhāppattā aggamaggapaññā
tika-s0201t1:1187_4: aññā nāma, tassa phalabhāvato aggaphalampīti āha ‘‘aññāti arahatta’’nti. Appatarepi
